name: Manic Man
metadata: {"name": "Manic Man 1", "description": "Manic Man is a character I drew a lot of iterations of during my most recent month long  stay at psychiatric facility in Connecticut.  I like many others live with Bipolar 1 disorder.  If you you yourself or and loved ones suffer from mental illness you know how tough it can be.  I have been fortunate to find art at a later stage in life and itb�s helped me tremendously.  Putting my brain on paper. I just recently started posting some paintings.  Sketches and digital work under the twitter account the_manic_man.  Ib�m releasing this digital creation of the original b�manic manb� I drew my first day back at the psych ward.  You can see the original drawing on my twitter.  Ib�m releasing it as an open edition.  If you like the art thatb�s awesome!  Add it to your collection.  Use it as a pfp.  Have it printed and hang it on the wall.  Or just bury it in the hidden folder lol.  Ib�ll also be airdropping all other future works I come up with to holders of b�Manic Manb�. Thereb�s an amazing organization called Brain & Behavior research foundation which accepts crypto currency donations.  And even though I doubt it will be much.  If any Ib�m donating half of whatever proceeds come from this.  Appreciate any support!  Much Love", "image": "ipfs://bafkreigr56yczdswrpytw4yiiifpe4uwhogapb2t7xis6ow3n2l5ev2ob4", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Manic Man"}}
